com.escape.games.api
Interface TimerCallback

public interface TimerCallback

Ability to process timer callbacks.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary
 void execute(long delta, long elapsed, boolean last, Locator lc, Pipelines in)
          Execute the timer update logic.
 boolean getRegisterOnInstall()
          Whether to automatically register during install pipeline.
 void setConfig(TimerConfig tc, int tbt)
          Setup the timer callback configuration.
 

Method Detail

setConfig

void setConfig(TimerConfig tc,
               int tbt)
Setup the timer callback configuration. Use TimerConfig.obtainToken() to get a cancel token for this timer.

Parameters:
tc - Target configuration to setup.
tbt - Time Base Tick in MS.

getRegisterOnInstall

boolean getRegisterOnInstall()
Whether to automatically register during install pipeline.

Returns:
true: auto-register; false: manual register.

execute

void execute(long delta,
             long elapsed,
             boolean last,
             Locator lc,
             Pipelines in)
Execute the timer update logic. Release any TimerCancel token upon expiration/cancellation of timer.

Parameters:
delta - Number of MS since last callback
elapsed - Number of MS elapsed so far
last - true: this is the last call for the interval
lc - Source of components
in - Component services.
